item.title: In Pictures: The best of the Winter Olympics - day by day
item.content:encoded: The most striking photographs from the Milan-Cortina Games.

item.title: Former PM Gordon Brown urges police probe into whether Andrew used RAF bases to meet Epstein
item.content:encoded: Reports say the former prime minister has demanded a full investigation into Andrew's role as UK trade envoy.

item.title: England bowlers secure crucial win over Sri Lanka
item.content:encoded: A superb bowling performance ignites England's T20 World Cup campaign as Harry Brook's side beat co-hosts Sri Lanka by 51 runs.

item.title: Explosions kill police officer and injure 25 in western Ukraine
item.content:encoded: Twenty-five people were injured by explosions overnight in what officials are calling a terror attack.

item.content:encoded: Twenty-five people were injured by explosions overnight in what officials are calling a terror attack.

item.title: Iran students stage first large anti-government protests since deadly crackdown
item.content:encoded: Student protesters honoured thousands of those killed when nationwide mass protests were put down by Iranian authorities last month.

item.title: Tributes paid to 'amazing' men aged 19 and 20 who died on Yr Wyddfa
item.content:encoded: They have been named locally as Jayden Long, 19, and Eddie Hill, 20, from Norfolk.

item.title: Can you name every GB medal winner at Milan-Cortina?

item.title: Funding approved to reduce cold deaths
item.content:encoded: Citizens Advice's Warm and Well scheme in North Yorkshire will receive the money over three years.

item.title: Met Police officers working for Andrew told to guard Epstein's home, emails show
item.content:encoded: The Met says it has not identified any wrongdoing by its protection officers "at this time".

item.title: Victim killed in skate park double stabbing named
item.content:encoded: Mason Miller, 20, was killed on Wednesday when he was fatally stabbed, detectives say.

item.title: 'Effective' SEND support won't be taken away, minister says
item.content:encoded: But the education secretary says children "will be reviewed in terms of their needs", under planned reforms.

item.title: How sister's success paved way for Atkin's bronze
item.content:encoded: Freestyle skier Zoe Atkin wins bronze in the women's halfpipe to secure Great Britain's fifth medal at the 2026 Winter Olympics, equalling the team's record-best haul.

item.title: How sister's success paved way for Atkin's Olympic bronze
item.content:encoded: Freestyle skier Zoe Atkin wins bronze in the women's halfpipe to secure Great Britain's fifth medal at the 2026 Winter Olympics, equalling the team's record-best haul.

item.title: Tories vow to lower interest on some student loans
item.content:encoded: Kemi Badenoch says graduates feel 'stitched up' as she promises to cut Plan 2 loan interest charges.

item.title: US ambassador's Israel comments condemned by Arab and Muslim nations
item.content:encoded: Mike Huckabee suggested Israel would be justified in taking much of the Middle East on Biblical grounds.

item.title: Trump says he will increase his new global tariffs to 15%
item.content:encoded: After most of his tariffs were outlawed on Friday, Trump announced new global tariffs of 10% - which he says he has now increased to 15%.

item.title: Key social issues identified in charity report
item.content:encoded: Each year, Citizens Advice selects social policy areas for analysis based on its clients' issues.

item.title: Son lived with mum's body for months after Covid lockdown let him hide murder
item.content:encoded: Judith Rhead was bludgeoned to death by her son, who was meant to be her carer during Covid.

item.title: Andrew is Prince William's problem too - and it makes his future job harder
item.content:encoded: Andrew's arrest has changed the public's view of the Royal Family, putting pressure on Prince William as he moves closer to being king.

item.title: MPs to discuss inquiry into trade envoy role after Andrew arrest
item.content:encoded: A cross-party committee will also look into the appointment and accountability of UK trade envoys.

item.title: 'It is a catastrophe' - the man battling to stem rising youth unemployment
